text: 5.3: Ese 13.10; Hos 13.13; Mt 24.39; Ru 21.34-35; Zo 16.21-22Mba gumgi gu mbigi khaŋ suanga, “Ntige tugar vhuuŋ ma, nza nzerara ki.” Mbe maaŋ suanga, mben farfarga bigɨn, ana vhemkora mben hɨgɨrga, mba bigɨna zaa mbik tara tɨr zav zaa ndi zaa farar muuŋgip mben hɨgɨrga. Mbe mba bigɨna ŋkɨɨarga tuktɨgi fhuvara.
